entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is introduced as a house-elf who has been warning Harry about something. He is described as having 'powerful magic of their own' but being unable to use it without his master's permission.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story and has been receiving warnings from Dobby. He is described as having a conversation with Ron, Fred, and George about Dobby's warning.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who is impatient to hear the story about Dobby's warning.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of Harry's friends who agrees with George that Dobby's behavior was 'dodgy'. He suggests that Dobby may have been sent to stop Harry from coming back to Hogwarts.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of Harry's friends who agrees with Fred that Dobby's behavior was 'dodgy'. He also suggests that Dobby may have been sent to stop Harry from coming back to Hogwarts.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school where Harry and his friends attend. It is mentioned as the place where Harry is supposed to be returning.

relationships.description: Dobby warned Harry about something, but did not reveal who was behind it.
Fred and George agree that Dobby's behavior was 'dodgy'.
Harry told Ron about Dobby's warning.
Fred suggests that Dobby may have been sent to stop Harry from coming back to Hogwarts.
